mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVATION_NO, S.STORE_NAME, RS.RESERVATION_STATUS_NAME, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_TIME, GM.CATEGORY_NAME, GM.GROOMING_NAME, D.DESIGNER_ROLE, D.DESIGNER_NAME, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_PHONE, P.PET_NAME, R.RESERVATION_REQUEST, GM.GROOMING_PRICE, PAY.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, PAY.PAYMENT_METHOD FROM RESERVATION AS R LEFT JOIN RESERVATION_STATUS AS RS ON R.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO = RS.RESERVATION_STATUS_NO LEFT JOIN STORE AS S ON R.STORE_NO = S.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT GM.STORE_NO, GM.GROOMING_NAME, GM.GROOMING_PRICE, GC.CATEGORY_NAME FROM GROOMING_MENU AS GM LEFT JOIN GROOMING_CATEGORY AS GC ON GM.CATEGORY_NO = GC.CATEGORY_NO LIMIT 1 ) AS GM ON S.STORE_NO = GM.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN DESIGNER AS D ON R.DESIGNER_NO = D.DESIGNER_NO LEFT JOIN USERS AS U ON R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO LEFT JOIN PET AS P ON R.USER_NO = P.USER_NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT AS PAY ON R.RESERVATION_NO = PAY.RESERVATION_NO WHERE U.USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY R.RESERVATION_NO, S.STORE_NAME, RS.RESERVATION_STATUS_NAME, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.RESERVATION_TIME, GM.CATEGORY_NAME, GM.GROOMING_NAME, D.DESIGNER_ROLE, D.DESIGNER_NAME, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_PHONE, P.PET_NAME, R.RESERVATION_REQUEST, GM.GROOMING_PRICE, PAY.PAYMENT_AMOUNT, PAY.PAYMENT_METHOD;
